member.name: T:System.Collections.Generic.ArrayBuilder`1
member.summary: Helper type for avoiding allocations while building arrays.

member.name: M:System.Collections.Generic.ArrayBuilder`1.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes the with a specified capacity.
member.param: The capacity of the array to allocate.

member.name: P:System.Collections.Generic.ArrayBuilder`1.Capacity
member.summary: Gets the number of items this instance can store without re-allocating, or 0 if the backing array is null.

member.name: P:System.Collections.Generic.ArrayBuilder`1.Buffer
member.summary: Gets the current underlying array.

member.name: P:System.Collections.Generic.ArrayBuilder`1.Count
member.summary: Gets the number of items in the array currently in use.

member.name: P:System.Collections.Generic.ArrayBuilder`1.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets or sets the item at a certain index in the array.

member.name: M:System.Collections.Generic.ArrayBuilder`1.Add(`0)
member.summary: Adds an item to the backing array, resizing it if necessary.

member.name: M:System.Collections.Generic.ArrayBuilder`1.First
member.summary: Gets the first item in this builder.

member.name: M:System.Collections.Generic.ArrayBuilder`1.Last
member.summary: Gets the last item in this builder.

member.name: M:System.Collections.Generic.ArrayBuilder`1.ToArray
member.summary: Creates an array from the contents of this builder.
member.remarks: Do not call this method twice on the same builder.

member.name: M:System.Collections.Generic.ArrayBuilder`1.UncheckedAdd(`0)
member.summary: Adds an item to the backing array, without checking if there is room.
member.remarks: Use this method if you know there is enough space in the for another item, and you are writing performance-sensitive code.

members.member: Transforms a character into its hexadecimal representation.
